snippet.title: [OFFICIAL] - Dying Flame Trailer
snippet.description:
What is Dying Flame?
Alone in the Dark...Find your Past...Uncover your Way...Survive...
 
Now available on Steam!  Go here to scream in fear, in the dark... 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1507950/Dying_Flame/

Don't forget to join, like, and follow our socials! 

FaceBook: - https://www.facebook.com/RoundTableGamesStudio
Instagram: - https://www.instagram.com/rtgstudio/ 
Game Demo on itch.io: - https://rtgsgames.itch.io/dying-flame
Discord: - https://discord.gg/GH44Dryyh2
